resources.string: Please Agree with the Rules!! Thanks
This is not an EzCharge Station Code
Please Tap the scanner to rescan. Thanks
Come On. Buy Some Snack First!! Thanks
Please follow the safety guidelines below when you are charging your vehicle
Part at EzCharge enabled charging station.
Scan QR code accordingly, select charging connector, and select charge amount.
Once charging connector is ready, put away your phone and step out to recharge.
Do not use your phone while charging.
I hereby agree to and accept the EzCharge station safety guidelines govering my use of the EzCharge app at EzCharge station.
You need the camera permission to be able to use this app!
How Long Do You Want To Charge
PIN not match please try again
Lot 44665 Mukim Batu, Kepong, Bandar Menjalara, 52200 Kuala Lumpur
Get Ez Snack items delivered to you
Please provide your vehicle plate number (without space) so we can deliver your purchases to you.
Top up wallet with Cash Soon 💲
Top up wallet with Cash Soon 💲
Bonus RM13 Credit coud be yours 💎
Enjoy these benefits only with verified account 🤐
